name: SGLT2Inhibitors
title: SGLT2 Inhibitors
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts of medications of Sodium glucose co-transporter 2 (SGLT2) inhibitors.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a medication for Sodium glucose co-transporter 2 (SGLT2) inhibitors.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent non-prescribable, branded drugs, components or ingredients.)
